https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/etEtzRitEfn9iqPZQC8xbcgseKb.jpg This documentary spotlights Debbie Allen's career and follows her group of dance students as they prepare for Allen's annual "Hot Chocolate Nutcracker," a reimagining of the classic ballet. Dance Dreams: Hot Chocolate Nutcracker
